settings.title: Crafted By Experts
settings.content: Including leading doctors and scientists

Puracy creates safe, plant-based cleaning & personal care essentials. Inspired by the needs of families and crafted by doctors, we offer natural, effective formulas for cleaning, personal care, and baby care needs, blending safety, sustainability, and premium performance.

settings.question: What is the order minimum?
settings.answer: There is no minimum purchase value, so add to your cart as much as you want!

settings.question: Can I resell on Amazon, Walmart, or eBay?
settings.answer: No, we do not allow any wholesalers to resell on Amazon, Walmart, eBay or any third party sites.

settings.question: How do I place my order?
settings.answer:
1. Log into your Puracy account.
  2. Enter your email address.
  3. You’ll receive a one-time use 6-digit code via email.
  4. Enter this code when prompted.
  5. Once entered, you’ll be able to view the status of any orders and see past transactions.
  6. To start shopping, click the store icon in the top right corner to return to the store.
  7. From there, you can add products to your cart and proceed with your order.

settings.question: Can I update my information?
settings.answer: Absolutely! If you need to update the email or shipping address associated with your account, please email us at wholesale@puracy.com.

settings.question: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: We do not currently ship internationally. However, international customers are welcome to use a freight forwarder of your choosing. We will deliver to your chosen US port.

settings.question: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.answer:
It depends on where you are - our fulfillment partner is in Connecticut. Once shipped, orders typically take 7-10 business days to arrive. In most cases, tracking information will be emailed to you once available.

Note, our fulfillment partner requires a 5 day SLA. Please keep this in mind when timing your orders.

settings.question: Contact Us
settings.answer: Please email us at wholesale@puracy.com. We will be happy to assist you further.

settings.content: We're confident you'll love our products, but if you're not satisfied, we'll provide a full refund. We may ask for feedback or a return to help improve our offerings.
